response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction. Considering its rarity and the importance it holds for both of us, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while preserving the integrity and value of the product. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can make this acquisition a reality.", "product_price": 1350000}
